review: Okay, I do not write reviews normally but this needed to be said. Amazon Fire Tv is amazing. I was admittedly skeptical about purchasing it as I had little faith in its streaming capabilities given that my wifi can be a little tempermental and I mean, come on, how impressive could it really be? I was pleasantly surprised. It streams amazingly well. The apps are easy to purchase and easy to use. I've seen some complaints about adjustments to the Netflix app but it has been running perfect. I am also very impressed by Amazon's attention to their customers inquiries and complaints. It is very much appreciated by the way!Now that I've got my praise out of the way I do have one, not complaint just some constructive criticism, I am so freaking paranoid about Fire Tv not having an OFF switch. Don't get me wrong, it does go to "sleep," but I am just so incredibly paranoid about shutting down my hardware that I can't stop myself from worrying about it. That's probably my problem though so I can deal with it.Also, for those who are still skeptical having read other reviews, Prime movies and tv shows can be easily sifted through now as soon as you download one little update.Wow. Super glad I did this. I give credit where credit is due!!! Love you, Amazon!!

review: We decided to cancel cable and started researching our options.  Getting the Amazon Fire TV was the best choice we could have made!  Not only are we saving tons of money without that cable bill, but the available free channels and games are awesome!  We have a family of 8 and there's truly something for everyone.  It's got great speed, doesn't appear to slow my connectivity for other devices and again, it has something for everyone.
